title: Mi Puta Suegra
description: Life can be hard when your suegra is always on your case!
altHero: mother-in-law pouring out a beer on the floor
alt1: mother-in-law swinging an umbrella saying, “You better not be watching soccer”
alt2: son-in-law in an armchair looking dejected
alt3: family room with mother-in-law in armchair with curlers in her hair
alt4: son-in-law giving mother-in-law a foot massage as she says, “Be careful with the bunions”
